languages.text:
The wearer gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}.
Whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} should be decreased to 0 for the first time in combat, they are restored up to 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} instead.

languages.text:
装备者获得+10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}与+10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}。
当装备者在战斗中{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}首次降为0时，会恢复{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的50%。

traits.locale_text:
装备者获得+10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}与+10{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}。
当装备者在战斗中{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}首次降为0时，会恢复{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大生命值{/g}的50%。

languages.text:
Дает +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g}.
Когда {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} персонажа впервые за бой опускается до 0, персонаж восстанавливает 50% от {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}.

Whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} should be decreased to 0 for the first time in combat, they are restored up to 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} instead.

traits.locale_text:
Дает +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g}.
Когда {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} персонажа впервые за бой опускается до 0, персонаж восстанавливает 50% от {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}.

Дает +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g}.
Когда {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}здоровье{/g} персонажа впервые за бой опускается до 0, персонаж восстанавливает 50% от {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}максимального здоровья{/g}.

languages.text:
使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}を10獲得する。
使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷{/g}が戦闘中初めて0に減少するたびに、{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大負傷{/g}の50％まで再生する。
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}.
Whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} should be decreased to 0 for the first time in combat, they are restored up to 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} instead.

traits.locale_text:
使用者は{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}を10獲得する。
使用者の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}負傷{/g}が戦闘中初めて0に減少するたびに、{g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}最大負傷{/g}の50％まで再生する。

languages.text:
El portador obtiene +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g}.
Cada vez que las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} del portador se reduzcan a 0 por primera vez en combate, restaura un 50 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} a cambio.
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}.
Whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} should be decreased to 0 for the first time in combat, they are restored up to 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} instead.

traits.locale_text:
El portador obtiene +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g}.
Cada vez que las {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g} del portador se reduzcan a 0 por primera vez en combate, restaura un 50 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}heridas máximas{/g} a cambio.

languages.text:
Der Träger erhält +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}.
Sinken die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} des Trägers im Kampf erstmals auf 0, werden sie bis auf 50 % der {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} wiederhergestellt.
languages.original_text:
The wearer gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}.
Whenever the wearer's {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g} should be decreased to 0 for the first time in combat, they are restored up to 50% of their {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximum wounds{/g} instead.

traits.locale_text:
Der Träger erhält +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}.
Immer wenn die {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} des Trägers zum ersten Mal im Kampf auf 0 fallen sollten, werden sie stattdessen bis zu 50 % ihrer {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}maximalen Wunden{/g} wiederhergestellt.

languages.text:
L'utilisateur bénéficie de +10 d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} et de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g}.
Là où les {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g} de l'utilisateur devraient être réduites à 0 pour la première fois au combat, elles sont restaurées à hauteur de 50 % du nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:MaxWounds}blessures maximum{/g}.
